sourcesContent: "use strict";Object.defineProperty(exports,"__esModule",{value:!0});var StringUtils_1=require("./StringUtils"),NumericUtils=function(){function r(){}return r.isNumeric=function(r){return StringUtils_1.StringUtils.isString(r)&&(r=String(r).trim()),!isNaN(parseFloat(r))&&isFinite(r)},r.isInteger=function(i){return!!r.isNumeric(i)&&String(i).indexOf(".")<0},r.forceNumeric=function(r,i,e){if(void 0===i&&(i=""),void 0===e&&(e="must be numeric"),!this.isNumeric(r))throw new Error(i+" "+e)},r.forcePositiveInteger=function(r,i,e){if(void 0===i&&(i=""),void 0===e&&(e="must be a positive integer"),!this.isInteger(r)||r<=0)throw new Error(i+" "+e)},r.getNumeric=function(i){if(r.isNumeric(i))return Number(i);throw new Error("value is not numeric")},r.generateRandomInteger=function(i,e){if(!r.isInteger(e)||!r.isInteger(i))throw new Error("max and min must be integers");if(e<=i)throw new Error("max must be higher than min");return Math.floor(Math.random()*(e-i+1))+i},r}();exports.NumericUtils=NumericUtils;
